ax.ha.it.smsalarm

Class WidgetProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppWidgetProvider
      • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.WidgetProvider

  • public class WidgetProvider
extends AppWidgetProvider
    Provider class for the application widgets. This class is responsible for all updates, data population, data presentation and so on for a widget. This implementation should be safe with more than one instances of the Sms Alarm widget.
    Since:
    2.1
    Version:
    2.2.1
    Author:
    Robert Nyholm

    • Method Detail

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(Context context,
             Intent intent)
        To receive intents broadcasted throughout the operating system. If it receives any intents that this method listens on the method takes proper action.

        The method listens on following intents:
        • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.TOGGLE_SMS_ALARM_ENABLE
        • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.TOGGLE_USE_OS_SOUND_SETTINGS
        • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.SHOW_RECEIVED_ALARMS
        • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.UPDATE_WIDGETS
        See Also:
        onUpdate(Context, AppWidgetManager, int[]), getWidgetPrefs(Context), setEnableSmsAlarmPref(Context, boolean), setUseOsSoundSettingsPref(Context, boolean), WidgetProvider(), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.LogHandler#getAlarmLogPath(), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.DatabaseHandler

      • onUpdate

        public void onUpdate(Context context,
            AppWidgetManager appWidgetManager,
            int[] appWidgetIds)
        To update all instances of the Sms Alarm widget.
        See Also:
        onReceive(Context, Intent), getWidgetPrefs(Context), setWidgetTextViews(RemoteViews, Context), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.DatabaseHandler

      • setWidgetTextViews

        private void setWidgetTextViews(RemoteViews rv,
                      Context context)
        To set appropriate text's to the different TextView's. The text's are set depending if user has agreed the end user license, and if any Alarm's has been received, status of SmsAlarm(enabled/disabled) and status of use devices sound settings(enabled/disabled).
        Parameters:
        rv - RemoteViews that texts are set to
        context - Context from which resources are retrieved
        See Also:
        logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), getLatestAlarm(Context)

      • getLatestAlarm

        private java.lang.String getLatestAlarm(Context context)
        To get the latest Alarm from database as String . If no Alarm exist or the Alarm is empty an appropriate String is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        context - Context from which resources are retrieved
        Returns:
        String with appropriate text depending on if any alarms exists or not in database
        See Also:
        logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.Alarm, ax.ha.it.smsalarm.DatabaseHandler

      • getWidgetPrefs

        private void getWidgetPrefs(Context context)
        Method used to get all shared preferences needed by class WidgetProvider
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        See Also:
        logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable), getPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, DataTypes, Context), getPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, DataTypes, Context, Object)

      • setEnableSmsAlarmPref

        private void setEnableSmsAlarmPref(Context context,
                         boolean enabled)
        To set enable sms alarm preference to Shared Preferences.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        enabled - Boolean indicating whether or not Sms Alarm is enabled
        See Also:
        setUseOsSoundSettingsPref(Context, boolean), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.LogHandler#logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.PreferencesHandler#setPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, Object, Context)

      • setUseOsSoundSettingsPref

        private void setUseOsSoundSettingsPref(Context context,
                             boolean enabled)
        To set use operating systems sound settings preference to Shared Preferences.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        enabled - Boolean indicating whether or not Sms Alarm should use the operating systems sound settings is enabled
        See Also:
        setUseOsSoundSettingsPref(Context, boolean), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.LogHandler#logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.PreferencesHandler#setPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, Object, Context)
